gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 111, Hornets 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Raptors defeated the Hornets, 111-106. RJ Barrett recorded 23 points, nine rebounds, and five assists for the Raptors, while Immanuel Quickley added 22 points, seven rebounds, and 11 assists in the victory. Brandon Miller (26 points, 10 rebounds, four 3PM) and Miles Bridges (20 points, nine rebounds) combined for 46 points for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Raptors improve to 23-38 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 15-46.
